page.title: 20TRANSPORT IN CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: All the transport in the area is by road.The only railway finally closed in 1977.The River Stour is unnavigable and only used for recreation.There are two main roads,the A349 N/S Wimborne to Poole and the A341 E.Merley to Bour -nemouth.The Wimborne by-pass in the N of the area,opened in 1982,eases the E/W traffic through the narrow streets of Wimborne Minster.Five bus services carry residents to BOURNEMOUTH (27 bus es per day),SHAFTESBURY (4 per day), BLANDFORD (7 per day) SANDBANKS(1 per day),to POOLE via CANFORD HEATH,(3 per day) and a limited stop BOURNEMOUTH to SHAFTESBURY bus via MERLEY.Car owner- ship is very high.Figures from the 1981 CENSUS are as follows,from a total of 2636 households,373 have no car,1347 have 1 car,735 have 2 cars, 135 have 3 or more.DATA{COLLECTED BY 2 {MEMBERS OF CORFE MULLEN AFTERNOON W.I.
